extras.name: Pluto
extras.facts: Pluto was reclassified from a planet to a dwarf planet in 2006
extras.message: We weren't supposed to land here!

extras.name: Asteriod Belt
extras.facts: The current known asteriod count is 1,113,527

extras.name: Halleys Comet
extras.facts: One of the darkest objects in the Solar System, Halleys comet only reflects 3% of light that falls on it
extras.message: You've hit Halleys Comet!! be more careful Fox!
